Class ChatRoomInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatRoomInfo

  • public class ChatRoomInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information about a chat room.
    See Also:
    ChatMode

      Chat room send message interval in second.

      • mInputInterval

        public int mInputInterval
        Chat room send message interval in second. For example, if the value is 5, you won't able to send message successively in 5 seconds.
